mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, parent_id, product_name, status, del_flag, create_time, update_time FROM nht_product WHERE del_flag = '0' AND status = '0' ORDER BY parent_id ASC, id ASC

SELECT id, user_id, parent_id, product_name, status, del_flag, create_time, update_time FROM nht_product WHERE del_flag = '0' AND status = '0' AND product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nht_product (user_id, parent_id, ancestors, product_name, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{parentId}, '', #{productName}, '0', '0', '', NOW(), '', NOW())
